ai-atk-s0508a211:158_2: Having aid-sphere inside itself, well-developed on embarrass and fruits, which is well preached in every way, serene, and has well-prepared, it is said, “haved, what has been said to do so in every way?”
ai-atk-s0508a211:158_3: and the Fortunate One, with his sarong and dreadfulness, giving up, is concentrated in immersion, and concentrated mind happy.
ai-atk-s0508a211:158_4: That’s why, when one’s deposite is reckoned as an eon.
ai-atk-s0508a211:159_0: all kinds of temperament in all ways: By particulars and of the gateways in all ways –
ai-atk-s0508a211:159_1: “All conditions are necessary to them.” And they exercise knowledge with knowledge.
ai-atk-s0508a211:159_2: So this accomplishment of the Nāgas, etc., in the way beginning, “This is the end of the Buddhas” etc., as happens when a Buddha is crowded with greed, etc., or if it is spoken by the Enlightened One’s special qualities, etc., etc., etc., becomes something that of the Enlightened One’s special qualities.
ai-atk-s0508a211:160_0: Doing so, he eats right livelihood, earnings, nose, tongue, body, and speech. He’s falsehood of livelihood, effort, mindfulness, and wrong immersion. He should not eat alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.
ai-atk-s0508a211:161_0: In the fetter of suffering, the suffering of whirlpools, the fetters of rebirth, and the ten kinds of fetters.
ai-atk-s0508a211:161_1: seed and small and great and small,
ai-atk-s0508a211:161_2: They cut all the (from the) bonds, ~ without having cut off the defilements, the ropes and the defilements,
ai-atk-s0508a211:162_0: For just as when born in water is dropped in the water, not with the lotus ponding in the water, not in the world,
ai-atk-s0508a211:163_0: cooled down with the riches of water.
ai-atk-s0508a211:164_0: The explanation of the meaning is that of the ascetic’s special qualities owing to his being educated. This is the meaning of: this is the opposite of.
ai-atk-s0508a211:164_1: Regarding the wise and learned, they divide themselves in the Teacher’s instructions.
ai-atk-s0508a211:164_2: they will disparage the Famous Ones, the Nāgas of Kāpaṭika, the Serpents, whose cankers are destroyed declared: “This is the ones who have subdued passions, who have subdued their passions, who are attached to fame, here and therefore (all) they will be disciplined by the Perfect Ones, who will know that the Nāgas will be called themselves.”
ai-atk-s0508a211:165_0: will become extinguished in the body, with pollutants, without pollutants, extinguished, cooled, experiencing the bliss of awakening. That great mass of defilements, who will become fully extinguished.
ai-atk-s0508a211:166_0: In this way, Upaṇḍagāma, having consecrated the fourteenth day of the Teacher by name, made the assemblies of the Yakkha, and presented the desire to be concluded the Dhamma.
ai-atk-s0508a211:168_0: The Book of the Sixteens is finished.
